page.title: 16The King John Hotel
page.content: This is not a place with accommodat _ion inside the building but opposite the car park is a house that is let out for weekends. This hotel special _ises in{'Good Food' and 'Traditional {Ales'. The most popular drink is a tradition _al ale called{'Six X'}and the most popular lunch is a{'Ploughman's Lunch' and people come a long way for it. Most food is sold in the summer because people come to see{Cranbourne {Chase.}Hikers use it a lot as well as cyclists. Tollard Royal inhabitants do not so much because they find eating out expensive. There is no children's room but can use the garden. About ten years ago it changed from a hotel to a pub. one of the problems in attracting customers is the small car park. It is not as much a village pub as before. {(AUTHORS:A.Wood, C.Pope)
